Package ru.soloviev.domain.entities

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
ru.soloviev.domain.entities.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
Class for banks that have list of clients, id, accounts rate, and transfer functions

    • AddAccount

      public UUID AddAccount(UUID clientId, String type, IClock clock, IAccountCreator accountCreator) throws AccountException
      Add new account to client
      Parameters:
      clientId - id of client for whom account was added
      type - type of new account
      clock - virtual time
      accountCreator - object that create account
      Returns:
      id of new account
      Throws:
      AccountException - if type of account is unknown by accountCreator

      Add money to account
      Parameters:
      accountId - of account to whom money needed to add
      sum - of money that needed to add
      Returns:
      part of transfer information
      Throws:
      AccountException - if sum is negative

    • ReduceMoney

      public TransferPart ReduceMoney(UUID accountId, BigDecimal sum) throws BankException, AccountException
      Reduce money on account
      Parameters:
      accountId - of account on whom money needed to reduce
      sum - of money that needed to reduce
      Returns:
      part of transfer information
      Throws:
      BankException - if sum is more than limit and client is unverified
      AccountException - if sum is negative

    • AbsoluteReduceMoney
